abstract: An article on the Square Feet pages on July 2 about the new North American headquarters of HSBC in Mettawa, Ill., rendered incorrectly the name of the company to which HSBC traces its beginning. It is the Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation, not the Hong Kong Shanghai Banking Corporation.

lead_paragraph: An article on the Square Feet pages on July 2 about the new North American headquarters of HSBC in Mettawa, Ill., rendered incorrectly the name of the company to which HSBC traces its beginning. It is the Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation, not the Hong Kong Shanghai Banking Corporation.
